data_table.description: Genetics of Bone Structural Geometry of the Hip, Offspring Cohort Exams 6, 7

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: UNIQUE PARTICIPANT ID

variable.name: Scan_Side
variable.description: HIP SIDE (RIGHT VS. LEFT) THAT WAS SCANNED

variable.name: problem_code
variable.description: INDICATES IF ERROR PREVENTED ANALYSIS AT ONE OR MORE REGIONS. CHARACTER VARIABLE

variable.name: idtype
variable.description: COHORT IDENTIFIER

variable.name: NSA
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - NECK SHAFT ANGLE. ANGLE BETWEEN THE NECK AND SHAFT AXIS (DEGREES).

variable.name: NeckLength
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - NECK LENGTH. MEASURED FROM THE CENTER OF THE FEMORAL HEAD TO THE INTERSECT OF THE NECK AND SHAFT AXIS. (CM)

variable.name: NN_BMD
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - NARROW NECK BONE MINERAL DENSITY (G/CM2). BONE MINERAL IN THE PROJECTION OF THE CROSS SECTION MEASURED AS THE AVERAGE OF 5 LINES OF PIXELS TRAVERSING THE NARROWEST NECK REGION.

variable.name: NN_CSA
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - NARROW NECK CROSS SECTIONAL AREA (CM2). TOTAL BONE SURFACE AREA EXCLUDING SOFT TISSUE AREA AND TRABECULAE.

variable.name: NN_CSMI
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - NARROW NECK CROSS SECTIONAL MOMENT OF INERTIA (CM4). FOR BENDING IN THE IMAGE PLANE FROM THE BONE MASS PROFILE INTEGRAL.

variable.name: NN_Width
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - NARROW NECK WIDTH (CM). WIDTH OF THE NARROWEST PART OF THE NECK.

variable.name: NN_Sect_Mod
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - NARROW NECK SECTION MODULUS (CM3). A MEASUREMENT OF BENDING STRENGTH THAT DEPENDS ON THE DISTRIBUTION OF AREA IN THE CROSS SECTION AND INCREASES AS THE SQUARE OF THE DISTANCE FROM THE CENTER OF MASS FOR BENDING IN IMAGE PLANE ONLY.

variable.name: NN_End_Dia
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - NARROW NECK ENDOSTEAL DIAMETER-ESTIMATED (CM). ESTIMATED ENDOSTEAL DIAMETER THAT ASSUMES CORTICES ARE CIRCULAR AND SYMMETRIC WITH OUTER DIAMETERS EQUAL TO THE MEASURED SUBPERIOSTEAL WIDTH.

variable.name: NN_AvgCortex
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - NARROW NECK AVERAGE CORTEX (CM). AVERAGE CORTICAL THICKNESS.

variable.name: NN_AvgBR
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - NARROW NECK AVERAGE BUCKLING RATIO. INDICATOR OF BONE STABILITY IE: ANY VALUE 10 OR ABOVE INDICATES INSTABILITY AND MORE LIKELY TO FRACTURE.

variable.name: IT_BMD
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - INTERTROCHANTERIC BONE MINERAL DENSITY (G/CM2)

variable.name: IT_CSA
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - INTERTROCHANTERIC CROSS SECTIONAL AREA (CM2)

variable.name: IT_CSMI
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - INTERTROCHANTERIC CROSS SECTIONAL MOMENTS OF INERTIA (CM4)

variable.name: IT_Width
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - INTERTROCHANTERIC WIDTH (CM)

variable.name: IT_Sect_Mod
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - INTERTROCHANTERIC SECTION MODULUS (CM3)

variable.name: IT_AvgCortex
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - INTERTROCHANTERIC AVERAGE CORTEX (CM)

variable.name: IT_AvgBR
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - INTERTROCHANTERIC AVERAGE BUCKLING RATIO

variable.name: S_BMD
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - SHAFT BONE MINERAL DENSITY (G/CM2)

variable.name: S_CSA
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - SHAFT CROSS SECTIONAL AREA (CM2)

variable.name: S_CSMI
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - SHAFT CROSS SECTIONAL MOMENT OF INERTIA (CM4)

variable.name: S_Width
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - SHAFT WIDTH (CM)

variable.name: S_Sect_Mod
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - SHAFT SECTION MODULUS (CM3)

variable.name: S_End_Dia
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - SHAFT ENDOSTEAL DIAMETER- ESTIMATED (CM)

variable.name: S_Avgcortex
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - SHAFT AVERAGE CORTEX (CM)

variable.name: S_AvgBR
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - SHAFT AVERAGE BUCKLING RATIO

variable.name: Exam
variable.description: EXAM NUMBER 6 - 7

variable.name: IT_End_Width
variable.description: HSA MEASUREMENT - INTERTROCHANTERIC ENDOSTEAL DIAMETER-ESTIMATED (CM)
